application.name: mrf2isis
application.brief: Import PDS formatted MiniRF level 1 or level 2 image cube into Isis format cube
application.description: This program will import a PDS formatted Chandrayaan-1 Mini-RF Forerunner level 1 or level 2 image into an Isis cube. It will also import a PDS formatted Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter Mini-RF LRO level 1 or level 2 image into an Isis cube.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.brief: Input PDS formatted MiniRF level 1 or level 2 file
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the MiniRF (Chandrayaan-1 or LRO) level 1 or level 2 filename. This file must contain the PDS labels.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the output filename
